title: The Face of Folk Music
description: Stated First Edition. 1968 The Citadel Press. Book is clean and unmarked, green boards with black quarter binding. Shows wear at bottom edge. Dust jacket is a mess!! It is intack, one small piece missing, lots of tears at edges, not price clipped. Lots of b/w photography. Proceeds benefit Oro Valley Public Library.
author: Robert with David Gahr Shelton
